price: 41. Nabii Nuuc isê luk yeemene marak doynikit kora teetik gexo leê bagul Yallih Migaaqal takkeeh, idyaa kee dabqiyyi teetik Yallih Migaaqal yakkek, diggah yi Rabbi dambi cabti li xuwaw li kinni keenik iyye.
arabic: ۞ وَقَالَ ٱرۡكَبُواْ فِيهَا بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ مَجۡر۪ىٰهَا وَمُرۡسَىٰهَآۚ إِنَّ رَبِّي لَغَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: waqāla ir'kabū fīhā bis'mi al-lahi majrahā wamur'sāhā inna rabbī laghafūrun raḥīmun
